I must say Alot of people won't stay if this continues and you won't make as much if you contantly let people down on these little things you could fix. Makes us feel like it's only about the money... it should be fun and enjoyable but that's hard when everything takes so much and so long.... Make the money worth spending.

This game has been glitching for the past 20 hours. can't log in. have reinstalled multiple tjmes. my army will probably have been wiped out by someone who has spent 120,000 dollars on his account (yes there are people who have spent that amount and that's what you're up against) glitch laden game. admins don't give a damn. I will get a standard response to this... if any. Don't download. don't play. don't waste your time and money.

I love how the game is. Our kingdom 489 have the peace treaty. We dun attack others tagged clan bases. We let them grow. But I currently now facing a problem whereby I can't upload my picture profile. It sucks. Help me and you get ur five stars rating. Get back to me asap. I've been trying for abt a month and nothing change

This game changed my life and how I live... Up until now every so called "strategy game" has been full of nothing but disappointment but then I came across king of Avalon and I was astonished that such a game existed. The graphics are breath taking and the community is truly like your in another world... 5 stars!!!

You will have my 5stars back if you just remove that K.E. in the gold event!!! Or maybe just make it 1 day only!!!  It sucks that all my troops were killed because of that. At least maybe if someone attack a city, not all troops should be lose half of them maybe. How can i gather  resources to heal them if only few left and takes millions or thousands resources to use for healing. Un installed!!! It sucks really!!!

Dont bother. You wont compete unless your willing to spend 1000s of dollars getting there. You can play 24 hours a day and you still wont compete with paying players. Your whole army wiped out in 1 attack and takes u over a week of playing constantly to heal only part of it only to be killed again. Even cities with the same levels get levelled flat by paying players bc of all the features u can buy to be steonger. Total bs. No fair game play. Dont waste your time.
description: Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings? FEATURES :War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne! Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust. Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours? Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime. Strategy! Get the edge through research and master devastating skills. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion! Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon fire warzone! Epic Fantasy! The Camelot Legend lives. Awesome monsters and HD graphics to drool over. Now play the King of online games, King of Avalon!SUPPORTAre you having problems? https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/king-of-avalon/Privacy Policy: http://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/Facebook fanpage:https://www.facebook.com/koadwPLEASE NOTE: King of Avalon is completely free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required. Do you have what it takes to become King?
descriptionHTML:
Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings?

FEATURES :

War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne!

Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust.

Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours?

Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime.

comments: Bright, colorful, addictive game play. Adorably happy graphics. Love "Mr. Encouragement", who exclaims "sweet!", & "delicious!" in his baritone voice. The music isn't my favorite, I find it somewhat creepy. Greatful for the music mute button.  Thank you Development Crew for a fantastic, free app which I have been playing for years! One suggestion: make it clear $3 gets you one-time access to your piggy bank only. Thanks😄

good way to teach us to be patient should we prefer to play freely.   Occasionally error.  KING, to make this game more enjoyable, .wld you pls kindly give us PIGGY BANK freely so we can still collect and use our gold? .pls give brief explanation on new things we're abt to encounter, e.g: HOW TO PLAY, the use of NEW THINGS.  thanks KING, jia you

I just completed all 3185 rounds... took nearly 2 years to do so. A couple of suggestions...  1. Some big reward must be given to the one who completes all the rounds... an uphill task. 2. All these years I played the spin wheel every day ... but not even once the jackpot was opened... it simply shows the malintentions of the programmers who programmed it as such. 3. Boosters must be given more often.

entertains well. but plz try to improve the swiping feature ncz when we want to play the first or second episode ,have to swipe all over down n got fed up with that, its taking too much time to do so. its really urgent to improve that thing.

I love this game but level 3166 is impossible! Once you take out one licorice another drops....you need to rethink that level, because it's a level that will make people stop playing.... doesn't matter what boosters you use the licorice keeps dropping and you can NEVER clear all the jelly!

Very disappointed in this app over the last several months.  Every time I go into app to play game I get kicked out.  It is not always immediate which is very frustrating because I will loose lives etc UN-necessarily.

comments: Only given a 1 star so the devs hurry up and get the game working again or else it would be a 5 star. This is the best game on play store currently and square Enix have done a brilliant job. No complaints... No p2w... and the graphics if you set them to full are just phenomenal!!! Keep it up guys!! But fix the loading issue so we can get back to akademia!!

Great game so far. Not sure if there is a community forum or something somewhere which would be nice. I had a character on some other server and it seemed to be erased when the new server opened? Its fine though, previous character did not have too much progression. Music is not the greatest though, would be good if you could include more classic FF music in the game.   Dailys seem a bit overwhelming. There are so many quests to complete each day to get all the chests.   Other than that im quite enjoying it. If you can't load the game after update clear data and dl again

Support is incredibly slow, they will happily take your money and not let you have access to the items you payed for. Will update this review if they ever actually resolve my issue. It has been 5 days since I submitted a support issue with no useful responses made by them. Update: over 48 hours since last response still not any closer to having my issue resolved

I installed the game. I was enjoying it then suddenly it stoped working giving me an error message of "license stoped working". I uninstalled it and will try to install it. I hope this time it won't happen again.   What?? Still having the same error! Please do something about it, since the game is really nice.

I was hooked up playing this game as you can still get stronger without spending. Unfortunately looks like something broke during the update and was stucked in the FF splash screen. Hoping that the devs are on top of this and release an official announcement to players.

Characters repeat the same thing over and over and it gets really irritating. And now the game doesn't even start, i love the final fantasy franchise and you have a really great game, and i like that you have to interact with the game to stay alive and it's not just automatic bullcrap, please keep updating the game.
description: 【Game Introduction】:An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.【Features】:-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
developerAddress: 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong
recentChanges: Optimizations:
·The downloading speed gets improved.
·The loading resources gets optimized.
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

comments: I'm glad that you've finally thrown in 5v5. It's a lot of fun.  I'm aware you're trying to do your own thing as far as mobas go but I'd appreciate it if you'd consider adding a way to set up your own build before entering que. Many mobas do the same and I enjoy putting my own spin on builds without having to sit in the shop menu in game for 30+ seconds attempting to adjust everything from the standard builds.  Just a thought.  Thanks for this amazing game. =)

The game is pretty good and the 5vs5 was the update I have been waiting for. Very easy to play nice graphics and controls are easy as well. But since the update 3.1 I have been getting bad pings but my internet is pretty good above 5 mbps constant an bing are well below 50. So have been getting thumbs down for rude pings. Kindly check i have been playing this gane for almost 2 years now. I dont want to remove the games.

I've playing vg since its been 2 years before 5v5 update. After the updates i was start matching up time was taking pretty long and when it start to play the screen doesn't show up, after that it return to vg homescreen. Vanglory is one of my favourite game in these years and i don't want to take it off from my device. Try to fix the issue pls.thx

Couldn't get free rewards for halycon, I clicked on them and it did nothing. I also had a rare mystery chest key and When I clicked to use it, it did nothing, not even get rid of the key. I had to reinstall and it still didn't work, please, help. I also never got that free chest for creating a profile. Very much appreciated if you help. I also don't know how to claim my five free heroes and one skin .-. And it shows I have no wins, which I do, but please, this really needs to be fixed!! I'm sure it's not just me who is having this problem. I also can't open my EPIC mystery chest, even though I have a key. Fix this.

Nice gameplay, very good looking graphic for a MOBA game, on phone obviously. Very nice and comfortable controls. Impressive multiplayer and, fighting system. But The only problem i found is sometimes i still disconnecting from games due to low internet connection, but i got a solid 10MBps speed. I hope Super Evil MC quickly fixes this up. Really irritating when im fighting with enemy hero and you just "pop" disconnected. The others features are just fine.

50 mbps connection with 47 pings tested during gameplay. Every time i start vainglory 5v5, works well. 10 mins in the ping goes to 30000 ms. I close the game and go to speedtest to check if my network works fine. ITS BEEN WORKING GREAT THE WHOLE TIME. i get back on the game and the ping is still 30000 ms till it goes back to normal after 5 mins. 5 MINS LOST. and after the game is over? DESERTER! do not push updates when your servers cant handle it. Its been happening to many players but they keep on thinking its their nets fault. Smh...
description: Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile. Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience. At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device. If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:- Real line-of-sight Fog of War- 120 FPS pro-motion support- Skill-based play & decision-making- Macro & rotational strategies- Objective-rich 3-lane map- Free Camera- Last-hitting- Wave Control- Lane Teleports- Active items- Intricate vision system- Original fantasy characters and storytellingVainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.----------------------"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK----------------------Features:== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease. == Guilds & Teams ==Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.== Chests & Quests ==Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!== Vibrant Community ==Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.----------------------Twitter: https://twitter.com/vaingloryReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/vainglorygameFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/vainglorygameTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vainglory
descriptionHTML:
Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile.

Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience.

At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device.

If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.

THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:

- Real line-of-sight Fog of War
- 120 FPS pro-motion support
- Skill-based play & decision-making
- Macro & rotational strategies
- Objective-rich 3-lane map
- Free Camera
- Last-hitting
- Wave Control
- Lane Teleports
- Active items
- Intricate vision system
- Original fantasy characters and storytelling

Vainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.

----------------------

"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN

“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards

“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK

----------------------

Features:

== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==
Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.

== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==
Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.

== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==
Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease.

== Guilds & Teams ==
Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.

== Chests & Quests ==
Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.

== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==
Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!

== Vibrant Community ==
Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.

----------------------

Twitter: https://twitter.com/vainglory
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/vainglorygame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vainglorygame
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vainglory

Super Evil Megacorp
400 1st Avenue
San Mateo, CA 94401

comments: Pay to win once you get to mid tier matchmaking. Fun still but some people de rank on purpose to fight people way below their character levels. Sometimes I get matched with people with 2 to 3 times my health and they also have more defense so it's as if they have even more plus can 2 shot me.

It's not stable while playing, it says all the time network issue but, My net speed has 75 Mbps, still having problems while playing this superb game.  Graphics is good Controllers are best.  During phone calls , we lose the match haha usually.

Good game  Except for the constant updates and also why when i use a breaker on someone(example i use laura shiba) and as she hits with her sword the strike move my opponent does still seems to overpower it..wheres the ethic in that? Lost many a battle due to this silly glitch..sort it out!! Once an attack has been made and is hitting the opponent regardless of priority moves it should still count!!

Good graphics. I really wish you could sell rangers and monsters that you don't want. It is way too unorganized for me having all these warriors with flashing buttons saying UPGRADE, when I don't want to waste my coins and crystals on warriors I'm never gonna fight with.

Its to much of a gamble. For example i had a match were i started of with block, defense, block. And my opponent had from the looks a breaker, breaker, attack. I got freaking trashed in seconds. Thats the biggest issue for me and like some people leaders are f@#$*** ridiculously powerful. Needs more balance

I have been a power rangers fan for years until the movie came out i loved this game its detailed the controls are great and my favorite ranger of all times is Tommy Oliver the green ranger white ranger and red zeo/turbo rangers and finally the black dino ranger

comments: Homescapes is an awesome game, combining the relaxation (and frustration!) of match 3 games with the joy of renovating a fabulous mansion. Throw in the fascinating story line, lovable characters lovely music and stunning graphics (except the kitchen wallpaper lol), I'll be playing this for a long time! I'm working on the living room right now, getting close to level 800! Thank you Playrix!

I 'my semi-hooked in it.  It's fun and challenging .  The characters are amusing, especially Austin.  I  do, however,  feel the games are  set up so that there are times when  it is impossible to win.  Games need to be winnable.   Some should be just be harder to win especially when  money  can be  involved.  Still, I  like it.

Its a mind blowing game i cant help but to play this game my day seems not complete if i cant play the game specially when i cant pass the next level and the hardest part is the hard level the time are very fast when i am playing.i really love it and the freebies i can get everyday to boost my game.thank you creators and the makers the graphics and the animation is very realistic.

This is really exciting BUT the levels get way too hard!!! I want a game that you don't have to replay a level more than a couple times! That's when I stop playing. It's a game...it's supposed to be fun not rocket science!! It should relax you but when you're played a level 6 or 7 times and you get down to needing1move to win... yet again... you get stressed!! And the levels should be concentrated on tasks to fix the house not on things like starting a new day or talking to someone to fix something! PLEASE fix these things so it's fun! I like a challenge but this is ridiculous!!!

Pretty decent game! Some levels are very  difficult to beat! Graphics are good, but hate the music! Good game to kill time on a slow day! The only thing I would change is you could sign in with Google or Facebook, just not Facebook! Some people like me don't have Facebook but do you have a Google account!...

Just gave it 2 stars from 3 stars, everytime i use the kite booster it doesn't work and wastes it by flying away. Continued is my previous feedback. Love the game but it is ridiculous how we need stars to start a new day etc. It is difficult to get stars anyway. The lives go out fast because levels are hard. It take 900 coins just for 5 extra turns to finish the level but you get 45 or 50 coins only per level. You need to change this. Make it on the same level, give us atleast 1000 coins per level and let the level have enough stars per task rather than 1 star per level and requirement is 2 stars per task. Something to look into.
description: Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home! The game features:● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house! Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
developerAddress: The Digital Hub, Dublin 8, Ireland
recentChanges: FURRY TALES
• Help your cat meet a lovely kitty living next door and give her a bouquet of flowers!
• Complete a special chain of levels to win pawsome rewards!
NEW IN MANSION
• Throw a surprize party for Olivia in a new room!
• Set up a dance floor and a fog machine and then hold your first rehearsal on stage!
• Enjoy the garage finale: help William get to the retro car parade!
summary: Homescapes
title: Homescapes

description: Destroy your enemies and become a powerful Capo - the leader of your own cartel in the official game of NARCOS!Power. Loyalty. Warfare. Product.Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official game of the hit television show NARCOS. descriptionHTML:
Destroy your enemies and become a powerful Capo - the leader of your own cartel in the official game of NARCOS!

Power. Loyalty. Warfare. Product.

Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official game of the hit television show NARCOS. Decide between leading through raw power or gathering respect through loyalty. Sometimes bad people do good things… In the end you must decide, will it be “Plata o Plomo”?

NARCOS
Learn the ropes of running an operation from El Patron himself and manage your “relationship” with the authorities through agents Murphy and Pena. Enter the world of Narcos with exciting events and updates of content from the show.

Recruit and build
Choose Plata and hire sicarios and build your defenses. Collect different sicarios, level them up and have them defend your base and add bonuses to production.

Wage War
Choose Plomo and send sicario led death squads to take over high value resources from other player cartels.

Profit
Develop your operation by building out your jungle finca with processing plants and labs. Select smuggling lines and plans to maximize revenue.

Cartel
Team up with other players to form cartels, lay siege to enemy cartel compounds in multi-day campaigns for domination.

There is money and power to be made. From now on, nowhere is safe.

About NARCOS:
Narcos is an inside look at the men who would stop at nothing to take down the cocaine drug lords. From the Colombian government to the DEA agents, from the policemen who would risk their lives to the US officials who would spin the story. Narcos is an unfiltered look into the war that would change the drug trade forever.

description: Do you want to be the manager of your favorite football team? Online Soccer Manager (OSM) offers you that chance! This free-to-play game is completely renewed and contains all football competitions and clubs from all over the world.Choose your club and manage everything: line-up, tactics, training, transfers and more!•	Over 5 million players worldwide!•	Play with your friends in the same competition!•	Solid 4.4+ star review in the Play Store for many years!•	Download and play for free!OSM is an addictive football management game, which allows you to act like the real manager of your favorite team. You are in charge of deciding the line-up, the buying and selling of players, the training and many other aspects.Need a new striker? Send your scout to Spain!Your pitch is not good enough? Upgrade your field and stadium!Player suspended? Let your lawyer appeal the sentence!After you managed everything at the club, once a day a match is simulated. It is up to you to prepare your team as good as possible, and make sure the results are good and stay good. And what is more fun than comparing your soccer skills with your friends?What’s new in this version of OSM?•	Official licenses of many clubs and competitions!•	Design got a big upgrade!•	New features, like the Business Club and Special Offers•	Easier than ever to play with your friends!•	More addictive than ever before!PLEASE NOTEThis is a one season game. At the end of the season you can select a new team for the next one. This way you're able to manage a lot of different teams over time, which is really awesome! So don't hesitate and install OSM now!The language in OSM is automatically set depending on the language settings on your device.
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to be the manager of your favorite football team? Online Soccer Manager (OSM) offers you that chance! This free-to-play game is completely renewed and contains all football competitions and clubs from all over the world.

Choose your club and manage everything: line-up, tactics, training, transfers and more!

• Over 5 million players worldwide!
• Play with your friends in the same competition!
• Solid 4.4+ star review in the Play Store for many years!
• Download and play for free!

OSM is an addictive football management game, which allows you to act like the real manager of your favorite team. You are in charge of deciding the line-up, the buying and selling of players, the training and many other aspects.

Need a new striker? Send your scout to Spain!
Your pitch is not good enough? Upgrade your field and stadium!
Player suspended? Let your lawyer appeal the sentence!

After you managed everything at the club, once a day a match is simulated. It is up to you to prepare your team as good as possible, and make sure the results are good and stay good. And what is more fun than comparing your soccer skills with your friends?

What’s new in this version of OSM?
• Official licenses of many clubs and competitions!
• Design got a big upgrade!
• New features, like the Business Club and Special Offers
• Easier than ever to play with your friends!
• More addictive than ever before!

PLEASE NOTE
This is a one season game. At the end of the season you can select a new team for the next one. This way you're able to manage a lot of different teams over time, which is really awesome! You can manage a lot of different teams over time, which makes the game more challenging, more varied and more up-to-date compared to other football management games like. All your results will be stored in your profile.

When installing this app, we will ask you for permission to receive and send text messages. This is ONLY used when you decide to use an in-app payment option.

You might wonder if this football game is really free. Well it is! You can play Online Soccer Manager for free as long as you want. So don't hesitate and install OSM now!

The language in OSM is automatically set depending on the language settings on your device.

comments: Greetings Making Fun,  Let me start off by saying that I absolutely love this game. It's entertaining, challenging and addictive. The storyline is engrossing and the graphics are spectacular as well. You can easily tell how addictive a game is by the amount of time you spend playing it at a stretch. Let me just say that I've been playing this game ever since I installed it. Whenever I sit down with my device, I start playing it and I keep on playing for at least two hours before I divert my attention to other matters. It's a really lovely and delightful game. Making Fun seems like the most suitable title of the developers because they've made something that is really a lot of fun. Well done. I highly recommend this game. DOWNLOAD IT TODAY.

Awesome game. Good graphics, great sound and music, intricate leveling up system and character build, easy controls, variety in enemies, lots of replay value, lots of gear to find, and doesn't take much data space. Reminds me of a Diablo type game. The developer's really do deserve a lot of praise for creating such a quality game and not making it a p2w. This is an example of doing it right. I can tell that a lot of thought and care was put into it. Absolutely brilliant. I can't praise enough. A rare gem on the play store, and completely free. Just awesome. 6 out of 5 rating. Thank you so much for such a great game.:) Edit: Thanks for the update. You guys rock.

Good looking game plays very smoothly. Fun to play and not too hard or too easy. Nice little details like the way your hero talks and has other party members. These things help make the single player game seem less lonely. I don't know if I am going to hit a pay wall or loose interest. The story is engaging enough. I just don't give out 5 star reviews.

Good game. Defintely like that you can play offline. Most of my issues with it are really minor except for the fact that the background especially things like walls, trees and hills can sonetimes block your view. There have been a bunch of tines where I couldn't see enemies that were right next to me because a wall was there.

Great game so far! Love the old school feel to the game! Resembles Diablo a lot! But I love the Diablo series so being able to play a game like that from the palm of my hand...GOLD! Tons of customization from characters, skills and equipment upgrades. Most of the better items are obtained just by playing! No need to buy items, save those gems for more skills to adding more companions to fight along side you! Running low on gems...just keep playing! Love a game that rewards you just for playing! Keep up the good work guys! I don't post reviews unless it's worth it so......see you out there!

The gameplay is the best ive seen for an android RPG Diablo type game. Slick graphics, awesome sound track and effects, no slowdown and you can play offline!! Absolutely love the game. Only down side is the worry of repetitivness of the game but i guess only time will tell
description: Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
descriptionHTML:
Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.

Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.

With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.

Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.

The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.

Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.

As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.

Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.

Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.

Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.

Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.

Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.

Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.

Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.

Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.

Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.

Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.

Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.

Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.

Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.

Making Fun, Inc.
4096 Piedmont Ave Ste 944
Oakland, CA 94611

summary: A tribute to classic RPGs, made with passion, not greed, by old-school gamers.
title: Eternium

comments: It's sad to see people complaining and giving bad reviews about crashing but not knowing it's probably because their device is  g a r b a g e. I have j3 6 which is pretty bad and still runs well. Very optimized, sleek game. Also alot of updated to keep the game fresh and the microtransactions are very fair.

Very fun game, wish it wasn't energy based, would definitely enjoy it more. The fishing is 'new' right now and i have to say the percentages are garbage. 75 percent is more like 50, 50 percent is like 10 percent,  25 percent is closer to 50. This is just my personal experience. The games is really fun though, expect to get annoyed with the fishing percentages however. Also energy gets spent super fast in this game, very fun yet very limited.

It's good and alot of fun but it's a bit of a tedious grindfest. 150% item find and I found nothing after going through ten dungeons. I want to keep playing but it's just another pay to win type. I understand you need to make money but I can buy a full loadout of epic equipment and run through a great portion of the game in no time. It's definetly worth giving a try but unfortunetly it's not for me.

I fell in love with this game as soon as I opened it the first time. But there is a problem which forces me to give it a 2 star rating. It kicks me out of the game every 5 minutes and that way I can't get any progress done. I absolutely enjoyed the little playtime I got and I want to play it more but it won't let me. Great job otherwise devs!
Fun and amazing game, great time killer for me, I just love these pixelated games so much.. to be fair it sounds like it's more Terraria and pokemon mixed typa thing y'know.. 5 stars

Been playing this for about a week.  It's a lot of fun with a variety of different things to do.  Running out of energy for doing dungeons doesn't matter a lot as there are three or four other things to do in game that don't require energy.  Will be making a purchase to support the devs.  Good game!
description: Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!Key Features:*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.A network connection is required to play.
descriptionHTML:
Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.

Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.

Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!

Key Features:
*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!
*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!
*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.
*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.
*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).
*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!
*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!
*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.
*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.
*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.

PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play.
developerAddress:
450 Sansome St
Suite 1200
San Francisco, CA 94111
recentChanges: Fishing is coming!
*Prepare for an exciting new mode where everyone gets a chance to land the biggest fish they can find and explore a new island.
*Additional assets included in this update to prepare for new content.
summary: Explore a vast new MMORPG inspired by your favorite retro dungeon crawlers.
title: Bit Heroes

comments: I loved the game up until the date of this review. Too many new customizations require leaf tickets. Which translate into micro-transactions. I was able to get everything in the game without spending money up until now. Now I have spend money in order to get the more interesting content. Sadly, this app will be deleted. I am not giving Nintendo even more of my money, it is not a real Animal Crossing game to waste money on.

First-time reviewer and life-long Animal Crossing player. This game combines everything good about the game series like fishing, but catching, gardening, decorating, and more. Therea is always an event going on to keep me playing multiple times a day. The team behind this game actually listen to what people say and fix it and add ease of play features! People saying this is pay to play are full of it. I have well over 600 leaf tickets from just playing the game... you just have to put in the time and complete challenges.

I love the happy music and the relaxed vibe I get while playing this game. Easy enough for young children to learn to play, but not so infantile that an adult can't enjoy it instead. The garbled chipmunk-speak language of the animal friends is hilarious! Level progression seems fair and regular. Pay-to-play options are not necessary to have a good game experience.

I would give this 5/5 across the board, as I have been playing since the November release and enjoyed every moment. Every update has made the game better, as the team listens and integrates whatever they can to make it better.  Microtransactions are ignorable, and they give leaf tickets hand over fist, besides the customizables for the campsite (foreground, midground, background) which are expensive.  Hopefully future updates brings better options.

Just like the actual Animal Crossing games, but with even MORE to do! The only difference is you're a camp owner instead of a town mayor. Oh, and the fact that's it's a FREE app!   Seriously, this is a real deal AC game all squeezed into a free app. It's perfection all around if you like games like AC. They did such an amazing job on it.

I love playing this game, but now I can't get into the game, all I get is support error 802-9016. Don't try and tell me to move closer to the WiFi source, because I put my phone on the WiFi router and got the same thing. My wife, who is sitting next to me, gets into the game just fine. I uninstalled that game, same thing... I would love to get back into this game, and will change my first reassuring back to a 5, but until then... Yeah... Please help....
description: Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite- Help Animals As You Explore!While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!- Craft Furniture and AmenitiesThe craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.- Your Campsite. Your Way.The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!- Host Animals at Your CampsiteAs you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.Cellular data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!

You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.

Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite
- Help Animals As You Explore!
While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!

- Craft Furniture and Amenities
The craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.

Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.

- Your Campsite. Your Way.
The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.

Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!

You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!

- Host Animals at Your Campsite
As you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!

Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.

Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
Cellular data charges may apply.
developerAddress: 京都府京都市南区上鳥羽鉾立町11-1

Implemented bug fixes.
summary: Welcome to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp!
title: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp

descriptionHTML:
"Zombie Siege" is a global online apocalypse survival RTS modern war game. FPS elements bring you face to face with the walking dead and allow you to strike back firsthand.

City-Building Game – Fort Building Strategy, Emphasis on Teamwork
Gather resources, build an army, and resist the zombie horde.
Join an alliance and find allies. Enlarge your territory and fight other powerful contenders.

Whole World Online
Compete and socialize with survivors from all around the world, and view wars breaking out worldwide in real time.
Summon Officers
Officers possess unique active and passive skills to supercharge your army.
Mech Fighters
Mechs are a powerful solo-fighting unit that survivors can own, capable of dealing huge damage to enemies all by themselves, as well as defend your city.
Your City
Create your very own city and build a powerful army to protect it.
Shooter Elements
One-of-a-kind FPS elements bring you the thrill of slaughtering zombies firsthand.
Team Battles
This unique style of play lets you assemble your allies and strategically deploy them in battle. Unleash your command skills.
Apocalypse Survival
In these end times, you can stay neutral, or you can play the part of a looter, gathering resources through battle and constantly growing your territory.
All-new Soldiers
Newly-added zombie soldiers allow you to resurrect soldiers that you lose in battle and enhance your power.

Download now! Enter this temple of battle and experience the art of war. Become the strongest commander!

PLEASE NOTE! Zombie Siege is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Zombie Siege.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: zombiesiege.help@gmail.com

comments: I first got this game because it seemed interesting and whatnot, but I then completed the tutorial and went on to race other people but when I pressed the race button, I lost 20 energy but I didn't go on to race anyone or do anything else really. I then pressed to race button again and again and nothing happened other than me losing all of my energy. I don't know why this happened but I'd like compensation, thank you.

I love the concept of the game, but there are some major problems. First of all the sound has never worked and that's quite annoying. And then there is that glitch that happens a lot of times when you try to start a race and it uses your fuel but never starts, and that happens consistently. Please consider fixing the problems.

I really wanted to like this game and it's a great game don't get me wrong but it seems like you can't really do anything in there without watching and ad or buy something. I hated how the are so pushy with micro-transactions!

Too many adds and too many game load fails, loose upgrades all the time due to this. Of which there are too few to begin with. In my opinion this needs to run seamlessly too keep a player engaged as the graphics and game play are so incredibly basic.
What did you do? Why ruin a game. Club gas bonus won't work. I've been racing the same three bots for days. Steals gas. Steals diamonds. Fix it! I'm close to uninstall we suspend real money you know?

This app used to be amazing when it was still in early access. Now the app is covered in nothing but advertisements. It's stupidly excessive. It makes me think that you're not receiving enough money from your offers. Oh, and by the way, your offers are terrible. Nobody is going to buy things fairly priced. We want bargains, and less advertising.

comments: As expected, it looks and performs amazing. Fighting mechanics and modes are pretty innovative and thrilling. It is quite stupid to compare the console version with mobile one. Each one has its own unique style, so they should NOT look the same, cz' each one provides the fans with a different gaming experience. This surely increases the already huge number of fans of Tekken. 5 🌟 game

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

As a long time Tekken fan I am happy that we have a version for mobile. I am also quite impressed with how smooth the gameplay is. The graphics are impressive for mobile. I'm underwhelmed by the controls though.  For me Tekken is all about the controls, and while I didn't expect a full controller interface. I feel like there could have been a better control layout available. Also the interface and game play menus feel quite busy, like there is too much going on. They could take a note from the wb fighters on mobile in this regard.

As a lifelong Tekken fan this game is about as good as you could get for a mobile game. Sure there's microtransactions but they don't feel shoved down your throat and you'll get a decent amount of fun before they feel remotely neccesary. The gameplay is good, simpler but as concise and impactful as it always is. The only thing that I've found off putting so far is some of the writing is a bit... off. Just some out if character stuff but the story dialogue is mostly setup so it's not too bad.  Overall this is definitely worth a try if you want Tekken on the go.

The down side is though, that if youre building an enclosed area, the villagers get in and you have to wait for them to get out so you   can close it.

You shouldn't have a certain amount of blocks. Also you shouldent have to unlock everything except for the basic packs. The way you have to jump I am not a fan of I wish it was on the other side. Lastly is it would be nice to have doors,so the viligers couldn't get into your house. One more thing is I wish you didn't have all of these assignments to do to get money and diamonds.

Start building and show the world your constructions. Block Craft is a free game for the whole family: from kids, boys and girls, to adults.

Features:
• Fun building game: Lots of different constructions. Build a house, a castle, a mine or even the death-star and Eiffel Tower!
• Perfect game for the family: boys and girls will love it.
• One of the best simulation games: it's a fun and free simulator game!
• Lots of pixels: enjoy the special pixel graphics.
• Free game: play for free!
• Choose your character: boy or girl?
• New: adopt and play with animals! It's fun!

Highlights:
Amazing buildings in 3D
Ready? Block? Go! Learn the game by building your house, a fortress or a mine... Decorate your building with your furniture with your own skins! Play now one of the best construction games!

Lots of Pets and free exploration
Play with pets! Adopt a dog, a cat or even an elephant! Unlike other block games, there are no monsters in Block Craft 3D: you can focus on constructing the best buildings or exploring the world.

Multiplayer game: visit your friends
Start the exploration! You can visit the city built by your friends (or foes) and help them finish their construction. Multiplayer is so much fun!

Create and sell
In Block Craft, no need for mods, launcher or PE. You can create the custom blocks, craft special furniture or complete blueprint of building! And even better: sell those and receive lots of gems!

Not so creative?
In Block Craft 3D, no need for maps, just visit the village of your friends to get new ideas and follow the blueprints and guides to easily build fantastic constructions.

Review by tech website Techtudo:
"... Block Craft is a beautiful and fun game. (...) fans of Minecraft will spend hours exploring and having fun in a complete, free game for mobile phones".

Block Craft is one of the best building games! Try this simulator now and have fun building your city!

Block Craft 3D: Free Building is brought to you by Fun Games for Free, creator of the 100+ Million downloads games Flight Pilot Simulator, Sniper 3D and Sniper Shooter.

If you're going to make a game available on other languages platforms, then you NEED to write somewhere that the game is exclusive in German. I'm giving 1 star because I'm angry I installed it and then had to uninstall it because of the language.
No pay to win needed it's great without investing cash
Best game in the world download now in the app store terms and conditions may apply
Top game
Great game! Can't stop playing ;)
It's alright but some achievements would be nice, as well as English language. There doesn't seem to be an option to change it from German.

Sammle Rohstoffe und rüste deine Basen auf, um schließlich die Galaxie zu erobern!★ JETZT SPIELEN UND DU ERHÄLTST EINEN PROFI-HELDEN GRATIS FÜR DEINE NATION ★FEATURES:•  Umfassende Anpassungsmöglichkeiten für deine intergalaktische Raumschiff-Flotte! Erforsche neue Waffen, Alien-Technologien, Kampfformationen und Trons um die ultimative Streitmacht aufzubauen!•  Rekrutiere Helden mit einer Vielzahl von einzigartigen Fähigkeiten und Klassen die sich grundlegend auf das Spiel auswirken. Ernenne zum Beispiel einen Experten für Kanonen zum Kommandanten einer deiner Flotten oder einen Buchhalter zum Verwalter einer deiner Planeten!•  Baue ein Netzwerk mit echten Spielern als Verbündeten auf und trainiere mit ihnen in Übungsschlachten, folge ihnen auf spannenden Feldzügen gegen Aliens oder versuche dein Glück als Stratege im endlosen Krieg zweier Seiten!•  Im Kampagnen-Modus warten 60 spannende Missionen auf dich und werden dir dein ganzes Können abverlangen. descriptionHTML:
Entdecke noch unbekannte Planeten und nimm Teil an einem nie endenden Krieg zwischen zwei verfeindeten Parteien im All! Tauche ein in ein perfekt abgestimmtes Universum mit unglaublicher Tiefe und ausbalanciertem Gameplay. Das ist das neue Aufbau-Strategiespiel für Könner! Ein Sci-Fi Universum mit fein abgestimmtem Gameplay und von hoher Komplexität. Sammle Rohstoffe und rüste deine Basen auf, um schließlich die Galaxie zu erobern!

★ JETZT SPIELEN UND DU ERHÄLTST EINEN PROFI-HELDEN GRATIS FÜR DEINE NATION ★

FEATURES:

• Umfassende Anpassungsmöglichkeiten für deine intergalaktische Raumschiff-Flotte! Erforsche neue Waffen, Alien-Technologien, Kampfformationen und Trons um die ultimative Streitmacht aufzubauen!

• Rekrutiere Helden mit einer Vielzahl von einzigartigen Fähigkeiten und Klassen die sich grundlegend auf das Spiel auswirken. Ernenne zum Beispiel einen Experten für Kanonen zum Kommandanten einer deiner Flotten oder einen Buchhalter zum Verwalter einer deiner Planeten!

• Baue ein Netzwerk mit echten Spielern als Verbündeten auf und trainiere mit ihnen in Übungsschlachten, folge ihnen auf spannenden Feldzügen gegen Aliens oder versuche dein Glück als Stratege im endlosen Krieg zweier Seiten!

• Im Kampagnen-Modus warten 60 spannende Missionen auf dich und werden dir dein ganzes Können abverlangen. Es erwarten dich neue Gegner, Technologien und Erfolge!

Astronest - Weltraum-Imperium ist gratis! Spiele jetzt und tritt der Gemeinschaft von passionierten Strategen und Waffenexperten auf Facebook und dem Forum bei!

Spiele Astronest - Weltraum-Imperium noch heute!

http://www.facebook.com/Astronest.Deutsch/

Falls Du noch Fragen oder Anliegen hast, bitte kontaktiere uns über die Hilfe im Spiel oder per E-Mail: astronest@ime-mobile.zendesk.com
developerAddress: Room 701, Pangyoyeok-ro 231, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

8. Extraktion Kubus gleichzeitig hinzugefugt

title: Astronest - Weltraum-Imperium

comments: Wish the hearts were half price and that I could replay episodes without paying a new ticket. I've spent an embarrassing amount of money, about 900usd and counting. The overall quality of the stories is good. The variety of characters is good, but it would be nice to have more than one female love intrest per story. Go Persephone! 😻😚💘

This is great! The best romance game I've come across. Only thing is maybe more female love interests and definitely have a system that gives you like 5 hearts a day? Just to get those back because I haven't played the game in a week and a half because of no hearts.

Hearts are too expensive and the hearts needed for some choices are way too high. Daily loggin rewards don't have a good enough chance to get them either. Stories are great and I enjoy them very much. Would recommend for others even those who don't want to spend the money. I myself haven't paid a cent because of the high prices.

I really enjoyed reading different stories. Loving this apps.Just please add more tickets... and also it takes forever to waitq for the next season or episodes..it spoils my excitement.. please don't make us wait .. your stories are all really good..just make it more fast in adding new season or episode please please please

I've been playing the game for a really long time now since I was 13 or 14 and am now 17 turning 18 this year and I'm sooooo happy with how it's grown but the one issue I have is the hearts thing. I can't pay the specific amount to get a whole stash of heart and it really bugs me because I love the options that you give us but I don't have hearts...can you please look into it and come up withe something ?

This game is addicting and is very fun I think you will love it.I did so try it out and see what happens.The one I loved the most was gangster love ash so I advise you to try that one out if you want.Also with the gangster love series try out chance he's fun
description: "Choose your ideal romance and enjoy the love you’ve always wanted to in this unique visual romance novel game! Find a story that captures your heart and decide who you want to fall in love with from a  selection of 50 unique characters! Current available series are:VILLAINOUS NIGHTS: In a world of super powered humans, you find yourself with a group of powerful Super Villains and discover that  love can bloom even in the darkest of nights. HAVENFALL IS FOR LOVERS: Vampires, Werewolves, and Demons, oh my! Find your Supernatural Soulmate in this mysterious and exciting story! GANGSTERS IN LOVE: The most dangerous and sexy gang in Los Angeles is after you… and your heart! LOVE & LEGENDS: Destiny takes you from your everyday life to a world of swords and sorcery! Now you must tie your fate to one of seven fantasy heroes.STARSHIP PROMISE: Explore the universe and discover a galaxy of love in this exciting spacefaring romance set far in the future!ASTORIA: FATE’S KISS: The fate of the world will change with just one kiss!  Fall in love with the Gods and Monsters of Greek Mythology! TO LOVE & PROTECT: One minute you are a normal college student, the next, you are the secret love child of the President of the United States! CASTAWAY! LOVE’S ADVENTURE: A pleasure cruise gone wrong leaves you stranded on a remote island with 5 Sexy Strangers! SPEAKEASY TONIGHT: Enjoy the glamorous but dangerous world of a speakeasy filled with illegal booze, hot jazz, and even hotter romance! "

comments: This game is very fun and addicting. My only complaint is there isn't enough variation in the astromons. Some of them you can tell they are based off of a certain elemental character that's say...water but then the fire version is the same looking just red instead of blue. It's strange. Maybe change up how they look a bit more like in Pokemon with all of eevee evolutions. But then again it's a free game and I have been having a blast playing it. Thank you.

As a beginner in the game, all the interaction menus and stuff you need to get to, or just wanna check out, take way to long to get to, as they're complicated and hold a lot of the game in them. It'd be great if there were an easier way to figure out what they do, to get the most out of the game as a newbie, instead of going through 30 tutorials of their own to find out. Otherwise, I love the gameplay, characters, and art. Great game all in all.

It's nice overall. But you gotta spend a lot if you want 5 star units. I already did 3-4 600 gem summons and everytime they just give you 1 4stars unit the rest are 2 and 3 stars even when they say 'chances up'.

Please fix the constant crashing during clan battles. Other than that its a wonderful games. Also it's becomes harder get gold as you level up which sucks. I love the game. Cute astromon, Wonderful evolutions, and even a nice story!

so I have been playing this game for awhile now and the only major flaw I have found is that if you choose to pay for astrogems they are ridiculous expensive for pretty much nothing. I understand it is probably so it doesn't come as a pay to win game but ya. Also I wish appearance rates for rares and up for better.  I love this game. Really not an understatement. It's the perfect time killer and for me I doesn't get old. The only thing I would change is on the hard and extreme levels I wouldn't have the astromon revert to their original forms after you catch them.

There is no other game that I have ever found quite like Monster Super League. It's fun to play, the monsters have great designs, and while spending real world money is an option, it's not required to progress. And progressing without spending money is easy. I wish there were more games like this one out there.
