comments: I love this game. Reminds me of the old GTA games. Sandreas, Vice City Stories, Liberty City Stories,  you know. Controls are a little diffucult but if you have a OTG cable and a controller, it makes the controls a whole lot bearable. Besides the little difficult controls, graphics are great, games runs smooth, voices in the game are amazing, and this mobile verson of Vice City is just amazing! I am really enjoying it so far. Definitely worth the $7 and the 1.5GB of space. Thank you Rockstar Games for making this mobile version of Vice City, and for android too!

Well worth $5 Great story line,  interesting characters,  lots of missions,  ive only played gta san andreas on pc, before,  but i may actually like this one even better. Using samsung galaxy TAB S, just one request. The car driving experience does not reflect in real time, in respond to my steering.  Hard enough to complete driving missions,  this makes it almost impossible. Love it other wise. Thanks in advance.

I think the game is great but there are no missions available after a certain point.  There's no real stopping point it just ran out of missions.  Part of the whole reason to play gta is for the story.  I'm still waiting for Tommy to take on the people that he used to work for now that he has all this money and power.  And what happened to Lance?  Like, the story just stopped.

Fun All these kids reviewing this game low. . This game is old and they aren't going to go in an edit anything. Its not made for a controller if u want to use a controller buy it on a console. If u don't have enough space on your device that's your fault for not reading the description. If its not working on your device email them they can help u out or give u a refund. They will never have gta5 on mobile it be like 10gb maybe more and drain ur battery in 1 minute.

A- but loved it! Def better graphics than GTA III. Might have to tweak the display settings of you plan on using in different devices. Not all work flawlessly with high graphics. I wish there was a cloud setting or something to switch my saved info on to another device. Never the less this is still a classic as well and very happy with it! Lookong forward to get San Andreas!

Cant re-download I have downloaded this game before and while clearing out my phone space I accidentally un installed it, so when I tried to re install it after. it wont re install it says error so if you can help I will insantly give 5 stars because ir if a fun game to play. Error occured on samsung s4 mini. Got reply instantly by email 5 stars for you rockstar ☺😊🙋🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
description: Welcome back to Vice City. Welcome back to the 1980s.From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile. Vice City, a huge urban sprawl ranging from the beach to the swamps and the glitz to the ghetto, was one of the most varied, complete and alive digital cities ever created. Combining open-world gameplay with a character driven narrative, you arrive in a town brimming with delights and degradation and given the opportunity to take it over as you choose. To celebrate its 10 year anniversary, Rockstar Games brings Grand Theft Auto: Vice City to mobile devices with high-resolution graphics, updated controls and a host of new features including: • Beautifully updated graphics, character models and lighting effects • New, precisely tailored firing and targeting options • Custom controls with a fully customizable layout • Massive campaign with countless hours of gameplay• Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controller and select USB gamepads• Integrated with Immersion tactile effects  • Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Korean, Russian, and Japanese. Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is now available on:Android Phones: Motorola Atrix, Motorola Atrix HD, Motorola Atrix 4G, Motorola Photon, HTC Rezound, HTC One X, HTC One X+, Samsung Galaxy Nexus, Samsung Galaxy Note, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, Samsung Galaxy R, Samsung Epic 4G, Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Galaxy S3, Google Nexus 4, Sony Xperia Play, Sony Xperia Sola, Sony Xperia S / P / T & TL, Sony Walkman Z Series Media Player Android Tablets: Acer Iconia, Asus Eee Pad Transformer Prime, Asus Transformer Pad TF300T, Asus Transformer Pad Infinity 700, Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy Tab 7.0 / 7.7 / 8.9 & 10.1, Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1, Sony Tablet S, Sony Tablet P, Sony Xperia Tablet S, Toshiba Thrive, Toshiba Regza, Google Nexus 7, Google Nexus 10, Fujitsu Stylistic 10.1**Grand Theft Auto: Vice City was developed and tested only on these devices. If your device is not listed, please check support.rockstargames.com for any updates to this list**  For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. Please ensure you have at least 1.5 GB of free space before installing Grand Theft Auto: Vice City.Mobile Version developed by War Drum Studioswww.wardrumstudios.com  Find out more:www.rockstargames.com See videos:www.youtube.com/rockstargames Follow us: www.facebook.com/rockstargameswww.twitter.com/rockstargames

Welcome back to Vice City. Welcome back to the 1980s.

From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile. Vice City, a huge urban sprawl ranging from the beach to the swamps and the glitz to the ghetto, was one of the most varied, complete and alive digital cities ever created. Combining open-world gameplay with a character driven narrative, you arrive in a town brimming with delights and degradation and given the opportunity to take it over as you choose.

To celebrate its 10 year anniversary, Rockstar Games brings Grand Theft Auto: Vice City to mobile devices with high-resolution graphics, updated controls and a host of new features including:

• Beautifully updated graphics, character models and lighting effects
• New, precisely tailored firing and targeting options
• Custom controls with a fully customizable layout

Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Korean, Russian, and Japanese.

comments: To the guy that says stop bitching cuz it's free. Reviews are so they can get feedback to improve the game. What good is the game if you can only play 2 games a day? There are too many other games out there that are free that customers can get chips to play for hours. This game should take care of their loyal customers before they move on to some of the other games. So many have posted about the small amount of chips received and they added the spinning wheel, maybe by reading the reviews they are listening and trying to improve chances of getting more chips. If everyone continues to give low reviews, maybe just maybe they'll increase our chances to get more daily chips!

Purchased 90 rockets pack. Explained to me how I used all 90 in one game? Smh, that's too much.. So y'all want ppl to purchase rockets each hand. Y'all can do better. Chip packages as well. Maybe u will get more to contribute to the game. Smh, better chip packages probably will definitely help this game. Especially the price of chips to play verses what the rooms payout... Really is at a disadvantage to players to even purchase.

I usually love this game. However, today I decided to treat myself and purchase some chips to get the last two battle ships that I needed to get 800 chips. The game is so frigging rigged it's just sad. It took all 600 chips that I bought and all that I won trying to accomplish a goal.  I will NEVER purchase chips again, especially in this game.

Most of my purchases lately have been strange disappearing chips and rockets i have spent SO much  money on this game!!! and another thing i could not access any games for 2 days now but it TOOK ALL MY CHIPS AGAIN SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE I HAVE ALREADY CONTACTED YOU IN REGARDS TO THIS.

Good variety of games. Not many free chips once the first few rounds are played when compared to what the rounds cost. Be ready to buy, buy, buy if you aren't patient. They have added many more chances for free chips. Thank you guys.

I love the game again.  I'd been struggling with glitches and now they're fixed  I'm especially loving the free chips you give sometimes daily!  I've become re-addicted to it!  The new format IS easier to see, but it gets slightly boring when the two cards you CAN daub don't get any numbers!  It looks as if you're phasing out the gems, which is fine with me; I'd rather have all free daubs, chips, and only a FEW coin power plays.  The free daubs make all the difference between winning and losing.  Also, would like to see winning bingos actually give me the items I need to complete rooms and for you to increase the daily chips for every completed room.

[선택적 접근권한] - 게임의 설정과 캐시 저장, 1:1 문의 응대 지원을 위해 기기 사진, 미디어, 파일 사용 권한이 필요합니다. - 각종 알림 푸시 발송을 위해 주소록 접근 권한이 필요합니다. - 안드로이드 6.0 미만 버전의 단말장치의 경우, 권한 거부 시 게임을 이용하실 수 없습니다.﻿[접근권한 철회 방법]* 안드로이드6.0 이상: - 접근권한별 철회: 단말기 설정 > 앱 > 더보기(설정 및 제어) > 앱 설정 > 앱 권한 > 해당 접근권한 선택 > 접근권한 동의 또는 철회 선택- 앱별 철회: 단말기 설정 > 앱 > 해당 앱 선택 > 권한 선택 > 접근권한 동의 또는 철회 선택* 안드로이드6.0 미만: 운영체제 특성상 접근권한별 철회가 불가능하므로, 앱을 삭제하는 경우에만 철회 가능합니다. 안드로이드 버전을 6.0 이상으로 업그레이드해주시길 권장합니다.◈ 게임 관련 문의 ◈ fr.marble-game@kakaocorp.com / 1661-0950----개발자 연락처 :경기도 성남시 분당구 판교로256번길 19, 3층 (삼평동)+8216610950

comments: The previous update seemed to have been rectified but it seems, 'old dogs cannot learn new tricks',  because they're at it again, this latest installment of updates has level 13 in an impassable position. The new Legend, Level 13, mission 3, "Impassable!". By the time you have passed the top half of the mission,  you don't gave enough goes to beat the level,  like I say, impassable which makes it impossible. Con!

I am absolutely addicted to this game! It is by far my absolute favorite game on my phone EVER, hands down!!!   I'm always so excited when my energy is refilled. I'd play it all day if I could! ❤❤❤ this game!  Getting to new levels is always so exciting and it's challenging in a fun way. If you love puzzles or beating a witch that's trying to stop you, then this is the game for you!!  Thank you for this game! I recommend it to everyone!! 😅😆😆😃

I really enjoy this game.  I play just before going to bed just to clear my thoughts of the day.  I play when I'm standing in line waiting on a purposely slow person as not to snap off. It's a good game for me.  I can give it 4⭐, an increase from previous rating.  8/13/17 Just about 2 years later from last rating. I'm still playing.  10/11/17: I continue to play this game with the added annoyance of the interactive advertisement.  I am to the point that i will purchase this game for a small fee (.99) just to get rid of the interactive advertisement.  Interactive advertisements are there but it's not a requred interaction.  They have added a timer.  Great job.
My favorite game...ever.. But noticed the latest update, the new feature where the wizard boy appears after you've completed a level, the flashing is Really hurting...

Now a days while playing the game closes and a life is also lost. New levels should be added weekly instead of monthly.In spin the wheel many times the reward are not added. Pls fix the problem immediately of game closing and spin the wheel.

The game is fun but it cheats way 2 much! I should have beat a level again and it made me lose. I'm almost to the point of deleting it. I was in level 195 with 1 move left 2 beat the witch. I only needed 3 and made a 5 move play and I lost again. This is about the 10th time I've lost due to this game cheating. I haven't deleted yet because I like it but if it cheats again I'm deleting it like the other games that cheat. Today 2/15/18 the game is still cheating. I watched 3 vids and it said I didn't watch until the end. Ugh this game is fun but I'm ready to say forget itttttttt bc I keep complaining and new issues keep arising and they aren't even responding.
description: Spring sale package，50%0ff！Match 3 candies to collect jelly drops in order to advance along the candy track. With sweet surprises around each corner, a new mystery unfolds in every realm of the Jelly Kingdom. Whether you enjoy the excitement of brain teasers or seek a fun way to relax, Jellipop Match provides the ultimate experience of high quality entertainment.   Help Lily and her friends on their journey to save the Jelly Kingdom! Playing as Lily, you will fight off witches, monsters, mysterious elves, and more on your travels throughout the many realms of the kingdom. Master your moves and match up more than three candies to be rewarded with a variety of board clearing boosters! Use jelly spoons, cross bombs, sweet juice, and other magic boosters to step up your game. Jellipop Match offers a variety of new features, game modes, and battles. Take on the Jelly Kingdom alone or compete with your friends for the highest score!   With built in game currency, Jellipop Match is completely free to play! To buy more lives, extra moves, and other special items, payment with real money is required. The payment feature can be turned off by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.   Jellipop Match Features ·      Hundreds of candy filled levels with more added every month! ·      Harvest new rewards every day. ·      Up to 10 spins on the Spin to Win reels to earn gold, magical boosters, and more! ·      Raccoon’s Requests to earn fun rewards. ·      Leaderboards to track your friends' and competitors' scores. ·      Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices.   Already a fan of Jellipop Match? description: Get your fingers ready for the ultimate music game! Beat Fever is an easy to learn, hard to master music game where you tap to the beat of the song, complete incredible challenges, collect music monsters and much more.  Sing, dance and move to the biggest hits from the biggest artists including Sia, Zayn Malik, Pitbull, Zhu, MGMT, Kaskade, Macklemore and many more.  Challenge yourself to be the best with multiple difficulties from Easy to Extreme! It doesn’t matter whether you’re a professional piano player, guitarist, dancing star or just a master of Spotify, if you like music, you’ll love Beat Fever!   When you enter Beat Fever, you enter another world where you can:✔ Tap to the top hits with both short and long versions of every song✔ Challenge yourself with multiple difficulties from Easy to Extreme✔ Create and personalize your character, choosing everything from your hairstyle to the shape of your nose✔ Explore virtual worlds where music is king!✔ Save music and mankind as you join the Beat Fever rebellion and master songs to defeat the evil Collective!✔ Show off your skills with LIVE real-time Player vs Player mode✔ Gain bragging rights as you rocket to the top of our global leaderboard✔ Chat and connect with other music fans from around the world✔ Play alone, compete against others or join a crew and take on other crews✔ Collect Music Monsters on your way to domination From pop to classical, from electro to house, from rock to latin, there’s a song for you in Beat Fever. comments: A+, such a great classic i never even realized how fun this was going to be on mobile.i have the consol  version and i like this version better keep a full battery so i can progress in the story. Also cant wait to ride my bike when i get to that part. and great fun on the sk8t board and really is a joy controller support as well. thanks Rockstar GAMES for cool bmx bikes ! it would be nice idea to be able to customize bikes and skate boards we could only dream. thanks for all the effort that was put forth in this Rockstar title. some of the oldschool best.

I thought it was going to be hard to manage this game with the touch controls etc but NO totally wrong, it's super easy as they've reworked them for IOS and Android and you can also customise them too, plus the game still looks great even after so many years. The only place I can say where it loses on performance for some weird reason(patch maybe?)is when you enter a bathroom(lol)but who the hell stays in the bathroom for the whole experience haha. I definitely recommend buying if your a fan of the game!

A great port of a fantastic PS2 game with amazing graphics for a phone.  I play on the Galaxy S5 which is a pretty old phone and I only have to deal with small frame rate drops in high population areas in game. Other than that, the game is the same, amazing game I grew up playing on the PS2 and Wii. I would recommend buying the game.  ONE PROBLEM: I recently received a phone upgrade and went from using a Galaxy S5 to a Galaxy J7 and for whatever reason I can't play the game on a newer phone. Pretty strange to say the least.

yes, the controls can be annoying at times but nothing a Moga gaming controller can't fix!! makes the gaming experience a WHOLE LOT BETTER!! Love this game cus it's a ps2 classic always loved it!! ALWAYS WILL! just wish they made a 2nd one to this plus it works great on my razor phone sadly couldn't play it on my axon 7 due to the axon being a 6.1 software.

FFS Rockstar, Works great with my Shield Tablet K1 but won't even install on my Shield TV 2015 because you guys marked it incompatible despite allowing it on the STV 2017? They're the exact same device? It works perfectly once side loaded as well. Please whitelist the Shield TV 2015 R*, Nvidia have confirmed its your issue so please fix it asap.

When it comes down to mobile games, I could never really choose what games to download. The moment I saw this game on the Google Play Store, I lost my mind due to the fact that Bully is by far my favorite Rockstar Video Game! I've played it on Xbox and now on the Mobile addition and man, I got to say that Rockstar did an amazing job with the updated graphics! The game play is amazing as always and the controls are very easy to manage! The game never lagged out on me not once, and I've got to play it on my new Galaxy S8. I recommend this game if you're looking for a great story line and free roam experience. The map is decent in size and you get to beat people up all The time lol!
description: The Rockstar Games tradition of groundbreaking, original gameplay and humorous tongue-in-cheek storytelling invades the schoolyard in Bully: Anniversary Edition. As mischievous 15-year-old Jimmy Hopkins you’ll navigate the social hierarchy of the corrupt and crumbling prep school, Bullworth Academy. Stand up to bullies, get picked on by teachers, beat the jocks at dodge ball, play pranks, win or lose the girl and survive a year in the worst school around.Bully: Anniversary Edition includes everything from the critically acclaimed Bully: Scholarship Edition plus support for high-resolution displays, enhanced graphics, improved lighting and textures, and controls redesigned for touch gameplay, all while adding multiplayer with new Friend Challenges.Friend Challenges are head-to-head classroom and arcade style mini-games: see who can dissect the frog fastest in Biology, solve word problems in English, help a flying squirrel destroy his enemies with acorns in Nut Shots, and much more.Features:• Includes the complete Bully story with extra missions, characters, classroom mini-games, and unlockable items from Bully: Scholarship Edition• Gorgeous graphics: high resolution textures, dynamic lighting, shadows and particle effects• Native support for high resolution displays• Enhanced with Immersion TouchSense Tactile Effects• Challenge your friends anywhere with turn based multiplayer Friend Challenges. descriptionHTML:
The Rockstar Games tradition of groundbreaking, original gameplay and humorous tongue-in-cheek storytelling invades the schoolyard in Bully: Anniversary Edition. As mischievous 15-year-old Jimmy Hopkins you’ll navigate the social hierarchy of the corrupt and crumbling prep school, Bullworth Academy. Stand up to bullies, get picked on by teachers, beat the jocks at dodge ball, play pranks, win or lose the girl and survive a year in the worst school around.

Bully: Anniversary Edition includes everything from the critically acclaimed Bully: Scholarship Edition plus support for high-resolution displays, enhanced graphics, improved lighting and textures, and controls redesigned for touch gameplay, all while adding multiplayer with new Friend Challenges.

Friend Challenges are head-to-head classroom and arcade style mini-games: see who can dissect the frog fastest in Biology, solve word problems in English, help a flying squirrel destroy his enemies with acorns in Nut Shots, and much more.

Features:
• Includes the complete Bully story with extra missions, characters, classroom mini-games, and unlockable items from Bully: Scholarship Edition
• Gorgeous graphics: high resolution textures, dynamic lighting, shadows and particle effects
• Native support for high resolution displays
• Enhanced with Immersion TouchSense Tactile Effects
• Challenge your friends anywhere with turn based multiplayer Friend Challenges. Play on the go and get notified when it’s your turn
• Intelligent touch controls with contextual buttons only when you need them
• Seamlessly continue your game across all your devices with cloud saves via the Rockstar Games Social Club
• Physical controller support


Mobile version developed in conjunction with War Drum Studios.

description: Your world is in chaos! Your once great kingdom now fights for its life against a scourge of mighty monsters! Treasure-rich lands need a hero forged in fire and magic; a giant among mortals with steel for muscles and courage for blood! Winning back these lands and restoring your kingdom to its former glory will require a brilliant strategic mind, deft battle skills, and the might of epic alliances. Are you the Hero your kingdom needs?Kingdoms Mobile is the latest, innovative, real-time-strategy game from IGG, the award-winning makers of global hits Lords Mobile and Castle Clash.● Command your own team of fearless Heroes! Send them into battle with millions of troops!● Fight in unique, borderless battles wherever and whenever you want in a massive world of kingdoms!● Perfect your strategy to survive! Only the most cunning of players will find victory!● Learn from your mistakes! Re-live dynamic battle videos - no boring battle reports!● Create or Join Guilds packed with players who share your goals and passion!● Chat in any language! Communication is no longer a barrier with Kingdoms Mobile's built-in translation tool!● Take Control of powerful cities as you rise to become the ultimate ruler!● Build your own fortress and collect riches fit for a king!● Only through power, respect, and allegiance will you win the ultimate fantasy strategy war!Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.Visit us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/kingdomsmobileNeed more help? Your world is in chaos! Your once great kingdom now fights for its life against a scourge of mighty monsters! Winning back these lands and restoring your kingdom to its former glory will require a brilliant strategic mind, deft battle skills, and the might of epic alliances. Kingdoms Mobile is the latest, innovative, real-time-strategy game from IGG, the award-winning makers of global hits Lords Mobile and Castle Clash.

comments: I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

Good game but......after a day into it you make no coin. After every level upgrade it pushes the (buy) equipment option. Not to mention every time you level up. You got to.exit out 15 boxes.before you can continue. Good game but, it's a failure on the free to play aspect.  My rating is fair and final. It's a (ok)  game but many better ones out thwre

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. I give ★★★★★s

description: The evil wizard Gargamel and his ever present cat companion, Azrael, have finally found the Smurfs’ village and scattered our lovable blue friends far and wide throughout the enchanted forest. Come along with familiar friends, like Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy, Jokey, Greedy and the rest of the smurf family, as they guide you on a family fun adventure to build a new forest village for the Smurfs to call home.Based on the beloved classic Saturday morning cartoon, your adventure begins with a single mushroom home and a smurflightful plot of land. Harvest your smurfberries. Build charming huts, special mushroom houses, and bridges. And decorate your village with colorful gardens, lights, flower chairs, hammocks and more!------------------------FEATURES:FAMILY FUN - Build your very own Smurfs' village and create a new home for the Smurfs.PLAY WITH YOUR FAVORITE SMURFS - Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Lazy Smurf, Baby Smurf, Handy Smurf, and Jokey SmurfHARVEST SMURFBERRIES - Use in-app purchase to speed up the growth of your crops and your blue village.SMURFY MINI-GAMES – While your village is growing, play multiple mini-games like: Greedy Smurf’s Baking Game, Papa Smurf’s Potion Mixing Game, Painter Smurf’s Painting Game, Lazy Smurf's Fishin' Game and a new free Handy Smurf minigame to unlock additional bonuses.CONNECT WITH FRIENDS – Share your Smurfs Experience on Facebook and send gifts to your friends' villages.PLAY OFFLINE - manage your village anytime without having to connect to the internet------------------------Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/smurfsgames Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SmurfsVillageFollow us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/bongfish

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to party with Talking Tom and Friends in a completely NEW KIND OF PUZZLE GAME! Sling and match colors to clear the pool and win! It’s FREE and EASY to play, whether you’re young or just young at heart, so jump into the fun! There’s no other game like it. Download now and start playing!

Join the Talking Tom Pool Easter Egg Hunt! Sling the floaties to find out what’s hiding in the chocolate Easter Eggs… This new, time-limited event has 30 brand new levels for you to play! Complete the levels to earn rewards. Download the game and start the Easter Egg Hunt now!

★★★HOW TO PLAY★★★

Here’s how you can rule the pool!

SLING, BOUNCE, AND MATCH
★ Enjoy the game’s unique “sling” mechanic – just pull back the floaties, release, and let them bounce! Match the floaties in the pools to complete the levels and earn keys.

TACKLE ACHIEVEMENTS
★ There are almost 30 new achievements to tackle, from using rockets to losing lives, and you’ll get experience points in return. The more you play, the more experience you’ll gain! Check out your achievements in the menu.

USE GREAT POWER-UPS
★ The ROCKET removes all floaties of one color.
★ The UNICORN will make all your floaties multicolored for a turn.

USE THE KEYS TO UNLOCK, BUILD, AND CUSTOMIZE THE WATER PARK
★ Use the keys you earn to open new levels and unlock more imaginatively-shaped pools with fun backgrounds.
★ Complete the 360 EXCITING LEVELS and beat all the challenging obstacles.
★ Explore worlds filled with pirates, dragons, and more!

Join Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger in this exciting water park adventure. It’s the ultimate pool party and everyone's invited! Get ready to party with Talking Tom like never before as you bounce, splash, play, and build the greatest water park ever!

Jump in and download Talking Tom Pool now – it’s free to play!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- The possibility to connect with friends via social networks;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: Lousy server! Having bug during war! What is the point of paying cash while I can't fight at the critical hour?!
之前的版本较好，新的版本非常难操作。尤其是翰林院的操作，应该要像之前那样，以名单的方式显示，并可以直接升级。现在升级还要一个个点进去升级，麻烦。
這美編是有什麼毛病，原本頭像中式畫風挺有質感跟特色的。現在改成廉價通俗又劣質的畫風，看了就不舒服
剛更新遊戲 天啊 到底是怎麼更新的 顏色難看死了，很難分辨，那些什麼果什麼果也更難看了 眼睛看得更辛苦了，字體畫面都變小了，大臣的顏色也很難分辨
本来很喜欢玩，连续上线90+天。可是新的版本看不到5分钟眼睛又疼又累。希望能该回上个版本，不然真的不能玩了。之前细节虽然像你们解释中，比新版粗糙，可是旧版给玩家整体感觉比较好，操作和字体比较适合。
更新后 变得不好玩了 。全部东西变小超难看而且很难按 很多东西升级 很麻烦要按那么多进去了才能升级那些觉得很麻烦变不好玩了那个画质也感觉看到不舒服 。希望可以变回以前的版本
description: 原創清宮帝王題材手遊巔峰之作，盛世換裝，榮耀歸來！王侯將相寧有種乎？即刻下載，回到大清當皇帝，從第壹視角感受帝王的戎馬生涯。明末清初，中原分藩割據，憂患叢生，加之海外列強林立，對中土虎視眈眈，大清江山社稷岌岌可危......俗話說，亂世必生翹楚，這個扭轉乾坤的不世英雄，會是妳嗎？遊戲特色：1. 第壹視角帝王養成系統，天子般的逼真情境感；2. 後宮選秀宮鬥系統，真實還原帝王寵幸翻牌子的奢華生活；3. 上書房皇子培養系統，體驗為人父母的快樂；4. 龍鳳殿皇室聯姻系統，壹手操辦子女婚姻大事；6. 校場廝殺，妳見過遊戲GM還會在遊戲裏和妳打群架嗎？7. 聯盟爭霸，必須熱血，必須國戰PVP才爽；8. 單刀赴宴，玩家超強互動大擺鴻門宴；9. 獨創推圖系統，征服世界需要腳踏實地；10.還有很多容大內日後再說~現在登錄遊戲，就有100元寶相贈~遊戲中遇到任何問題可以通過遊戲內浮標球-召見大內客服-點擊右上角人工服務或輸入“RG”聯繫大內客服或聯繫營銷QQ：800038995
developerAddress: 廈門市思明區觀音山宜蘭路5號25F
recentChanges: 1、圍剿八國聯軍副本震撼開啟：全園搜索，不落下聯軍蛛絲馬跡，怒懟進犯外敵，奪回失竊珍寶，敢在王土上撒野，朕要妳們有來無回！
2、新增狩獵活動-木蘭圍場：王公大臣、八旗精兵齊聚皇家獵苑，壹睹聖上精妙絕倫的騎射之術。被朕盯上的獵物還想皮？朕上戰場可都是帶了槍的！
3、搖錢樹活動限時開啟，海量豪禮從天降：外國使臣進獻神樹，以保我朝風調雨順、國泰民安。每日參與活動均可獲得神樹的饋贈，聖上們速來圍觀天上掉餡餅啦~
4、新增普通大臣英魂強化：強化再也不是清帝的專屬福利，守護大清江山人人有責，眾將領齊心協力共圖涅槃重生，壹振大清虎狼之師雄風！
5、界面優化：全面優化了金鑾殿、聯盟、翰林院等場景，裝修後的金鑾殿更高端、大氣、上檔次，聖上快來勤政吧。此外也對大臣形象進行翻新，新大臣更加帥氣，更加威武，坐等聖上發號施令，臣等萬死不辭。
6、其他小優化：養心殿灌酒數值優化，快捷推圖功能添加確認按鈕，萬能活動添加批量購買功能，新增清帝頭像等。
以上部分功能需要統一更新後才能開啟。
summary: Classic imperial harem develop mobile games
title: 我在大清當皇帝

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.
description: Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)DESCRIPTIONThis is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.FEATURES● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the gameSUPPORTAre you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.Forums & Guide:English:    https://goo.gl/ecChhsWiki:http://gdmaze.wikia.comTerms of Service:http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.htmlIt's necessary to use the below permissions:RECORD_AUDIOThere is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.The video below shows how it works in the game:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be  GET_ACCOUNTSIn order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

comments: Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.
description: **#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.Over 200 Million Downloads! TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing GameMobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in ArtMeffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013 Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice) “A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)REAL CARSTake the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.REAL TRACKSBurn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.REAL PEOPLEGo bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.MORE CHOICES THAN EVERCompete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCEPowered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.
__

recentChanges: Real Racing 3 returns to Daytona in our third exhilarating NASCAR update, where you can:
• Take on three all-new NASCAR limited-time series, featuring the NASCAR 2018 Chevy Camaro, Toyota Camry, and Ford Fusion
• Bring the 2017 Aston Martin Vantage GTE to your garage in an all-new special event
• Earn the 2017 Chevrolet Camaro SS and the SPADA Codatronca Barchetta in two limited-time series
Plus, celebrate our fifth birthday with a special surprise. Start racing now!
summary: Take your driving skills to the next level with the #1 mobile racing experience.
